item.title: Atelier Resleriana: The Red Alchemist & the White Guardian opening movie
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch

Turn-based RPG due out on September 26.

Publisher Koei Tecmo and developer Gust have released the opening movie for Atelier Resleriana: The Red Alchemist & the White Guardian.

Atelier Resleriana: The Red Alchemist & the White Guardian is due out for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam on September 26. The PlayStation 4 version will only be available in Japan.

Watch the opening movie below.

English

Japanese

item.title: Rise Eterna II launches October 9
item.content:encoded:
Tactical RPG sequel Rise Eterna II will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam and GOG on October 9, publisher Forever Entertainment and developer Makee Games and Ricci Cedric Design announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Forever Entertainment:

About

Improving on the tactical RPG genre at the core of the first iteration, Rise Eterna II places you in the middle of an ongoing war between two families coveting the kingdom’s throne and one plotting her revenge.

Set within an engaging setting, play as Jacht—a devoted Athracian soldier in a mission to reclaim the Empire’s lost glory and and destroy Lua’s Heroes Army.

Key Features

  • 28 missions taking place across various locations and biomes combined with Strategic and Tactical combats challenging your decision-making skills.
  • Terrains to use at your advantage! Depending on the type of tile units are standing on, their attacks or movement can be affected in different ways. Always try to catch the enemy at a disadvantage!
  • A compelling recruitment and party organization system that lets you test various combinations and strategies at will!
  • Customization with Gems: Choose from over 20 types of gems to enhance your heroes’ abilities and weapons.
  • Skill trees for each character with multiple factors including their own background affecting their skillset. Battle, evolve and unleash your skills in battle!

Watch the announcement trailer below.

Release Date Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/rise-eterna-ii-launches-october-9
